channel.title: Repost: making a clue scroll open a quest!
channel.description: please help, thjis is what i posted: "i want to make a clue scroll do something, like maybe show a quest. but there is no method or anything for the scroll so i cant modify it because there is nothing to modify. help? base is 317 delta"

item.title: Repost: making a clue scroll open a quest!
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

public void clue1() { clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Close Window", 4912);//Close Text sendQuest("Line please.", 6968); sendQuest("Line please.", 6969); sendQuest("Line please.", 6970); sendQuest("Line please.,", 6971); sendQuest("Line please.", 6972); sendQuest("Line please.", 6973); sendQuest("Line please.", 6974); sendQuest("Line please.", 6975); showInterface(6965); flushOutStream(); }

Read full topic
item.source: Repost: making a clue scroll open a quest!

If you’re looking for Clue scrolls to work you can go here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,469511.0.html
